itemLabel: Richard Ryder, Baron Ryder of Wensum

wikipedia_page.main: Richard Andrew Ryder, Baron Ryder of Wensum,  (born 4 February 1949) is a British Conservative Party politician. A former Member of Parliament (MP) and government minister, he was made a life peer in 1997 and was a member of the House of Lords from 1997 to 2021.

link_mentions.page: List of current members of the British Privy Council
